title: Senior Director of Products and Services
points: Helped AgileIS navigate the pandemic by identifying an alternative market opportunity for the company's flagship travel medical assistance application.
Created project plan and product specifications to transition product to a mobile app that assists sports organizations and independent schools manage athlete concussions.
Managed the build of MVP product with team of contractors.
Acted as primary application and infrastructure architect.
Brought new product to market within 6 months.
